hero.name: Indah Dwi Afifah
hero.title: Undergraduate Insurance & Actuarial Administration
hero.subtitle: University of Indonesia | Head of Internal Department at HIMASIRA UI
hero.description: Final-year student majoring in Insurance Administration and Actuarial Science with strong academic exposure about claim, accounting, underwriting, risk management, and actuarial science.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My Professional Journey
about.intro: I am a final-year student at the University of Indonesia, majoring in Insurance Administration and Actuarial Science. With a strong background in accounting from my vocational high school education, I have developed a comprehensive understanding of the insurance and financial industry.
about.passionText: I have a deep passion for the insurance and financial services industry, with a particular focus on risk management and actuarial analysis. My experience as Head of Internal Department at HIMASIRA UI has honed my leadership and human resource management skills.
about.goalsText: I am seeking an internship opportunity to apply my analytical and interpersonal skills in a challenging environment, contribute to organizational success, and further develop my career in the insurance and financial services industry.
